body.p: Improving Disclosures about Financial Instruments (Amendments to IFRS 7), issued in March 2009, amended paragraphs 27, 39 and B11 and added paragraphs 27A, 27B, B10A and B11A–B11F. An entity shall apply those amendments for annual periods beginning on or after 1 January 2009. An entity need not provide the disclosures required by the amendments for:

li.p: any annual or interim period, including any statement of financial position, presented within an annual comparative period ending before 31 December 2009, or
any statement of financial position as at the beginning of the earliest comparative period as at a date before 31 December 2009.

body.p: Earlier application is permitted. If an entity applies the amendments for an earlier period, it shall disclose that fact.
